# finalizeAndFinish(through:)

**Instance Method**

Finishes analysis after finalizing results for a given time-code.

## Declaration

```swift
final func finalizeAndFinish(through: CMTime) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **through**: A time-code of the last audio sample that you want to analyze.

## Discussion

This method finalizes like [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechAnalyzer/finalize(through:)] and finishes analysis like [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechAnalyzer/finish(after:)].



## Finishing analysis

- **cancelAndFinishNow()**: Finishes analysis immediately.
- **finalizeAndFinishThroughEndOfInput()**: Finishes analysis after an audio input sequence has been fully consumed and its results are finalized.
- **finish(after:)**: Finishes analysis once input for a given time is consumed.
